entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Rigolet
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:50 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 18.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 18. Wind chill minus 28 this morning and minus 22 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Snow beginning near midnight. Amount 5 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Temperature rising to minus 3 by morning. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Snow mixed with ice pellets. High minus 1.
entry.summary: Snow at times mixed with ice pellets changing to ice pellets or freezing rain near noon. Snow and ice pellet amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind northeast 20 km/h becoming light in the afternoon. High minus 1. Wind chill near minus 9. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Periods of freezing rain. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or rain showers. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of freezing rain or snow. High plus 1.
entry.summary: Periods of freezing rain or flurries. High plus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Wednesday night: Flurries. Low minus 1.
entry.summary: Flurries. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Chance of flurries. High zero. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. High zero. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 4. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy with 60 percent chance of flurries. Windy. Low minus 4. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday: Cloudy. High minus 4.
entry.summary: Cloudy. High minus 4. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 14. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15.
entry.summary: Cloudy periods. Low minus 15. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023

entry.title: Sunday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 10. Forecast issued 06:00 AM NST Monday 16 January 2023
